articles.description: Scientist Stephen Hawking made a 16-day trip to India in 2001, visiting Mumbai and New Delhi. During the visit, he met then president KR Narayanan.
articles.content:
It was January 2001 when British physicist Stephen Hawking came to India for the first time, later describing the 16-day long tour as magnificent.

articles.title: Donald Trump tells NASA to send Americans to the moon, prepare for Mars - Hindustan Times
articles.description: US President Donald Trump signed a new space policy directive, which calls on NASA to ramp up its efforts to send people to deep space.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump directed NASA on Monday to send Americans to the moon for the first time since 1972, in order to prepare for future trips to Mars.

articles.title: ISRO record: Chinese state media says Beijing can learn lessons from India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A grudgingly complimentary state media piece on Monday said the Communist country could learn a “number of lessons” from its neighbour’s low-price and efficiency-driven advantages in space commerce.
articles.content:

articles.title: China to set up world’s highest altitude telescopes in Tibet - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The telescope, located 5,250 meters above sea level, will detect and gather precise data on primordial gravitational waves in the Northern Hemisphere.
